About.title: About Us
About.description: History, Vision, Mission, and Leadership Profile of K3 Arafah Boarding School.
About.hero_description: Get to know K3 Arafah Boarding School closer, a place for seeding the future Qur'anic generation.
About.history_content_1: K3 Arafah Boarding School was founded with the spirit to mold intellectual scholar cadres. Starting from a small study group, it has now developed into a formal and non-formal educational institution integrating the national curriculum with the modern salaf boarding school curriculum.
About.history_content_2: The name "K3 Arafah" itself takes philosophy from the plain of Arafah as a place of wukuf, a symbol of the peak of Hajj pilgrimage that symbolizes self-recognition (ma'rifat) and closeness to Allah SWT.
About.vision_mission_desc: The foundation of our struggle in educating.
About.vision_content: "The realization of a Rabbani generation excelling in Faith and Piety (Imtaq), knowledgeable in Science and Technology (Iptek), and having noble character."
About.mission_1: Equipping students with Quran memorization and understanding of classical books.
About.mission_2: Developing students' interests and talents through extracurricular activities.
About.mission_3: Creating a beautiful, clean, and disciplined boarding school environment.
About.leader_1_desc: Alumni of Al-Azhar Cairo, Egypt. Specialization in Tafsir & Hadith.
About.leader_2_desc: Graduate of LIPIA Jakarta. Focus on curriculum development.
About.leader_3_desc: Master of Education Management. 15 years of experience.
